DocAttribute.Name: ContainedIn
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the element to port connection relationship. The relationship then refers to the element in which this port is contained.

DocAttribute.Name: ConnectedFrom
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to a port that is connected by the objectified relationship.

DocAttribute.Name: ConnectedTo
DocAttribute.Documentation: Reference to the port connection relationship. The relationship then refers to the other port to which this port is connected.
